nbttag: {"id":"minecraft:player_head","count":1,"components":{"minecraft:custom_name":"{\"text\":\"Blaze Ashes\",\"color\":\"green\"}","minecraft:lore":["{\"text\":\"Blazes are ephemeral creatures,\",\"color\":\"gray\",\"italic\":true}","{\"text\":\"constantly consuming themselves.\",\"color\":\"gray\",\"italic\":true}","{\"text\":\"Their ashes are said to bring good\",\"color\":\"gray\",\"italic\":true}","{\"text\":\"fortune.\",\"color\":\"gray\",\"italic\":true}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"Right-click to view recipes!\",\"color\":\"yellow\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"UNCOMMON\",\"color\":\"green\",\"bold\":true}"]}}
lore: {"text":"Their ashes are said to bring good","color":"gray","italic":true}
